name: A. Save the Nature
statement:
You are an environmental activist at heart but the reality is harsh and
you are just a cashier in a cinema. But you can still do something!You
have n tickets to sell. The price of the i-th ticket is p_i. As a
teller, you have a possibility to select the order in which the tickets
will be sold (i.e. a permutation of the tickets). You know that the
cinema participates in two ecological restoration programs applying them
: The x
